articles.author: Heather Cox Richardson
articles.title: September 23, 2025 - Letters from an American | Heather Cox Richardson
articles.description: In New York City this morning, the United Nations opened its General Assembly, marking the 80th anniversary of the establishment of the United Nations itself.
articles.content: In New York City this morning, the United Nations opened its General Assembly, marking the 80th anniversary of the establishment of the United Nations itself. The day began with a General Debate, the… [+9240 chars]
